oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: hemm's speech and |kaggen's (the Mantis's) reply, in which |kaggen speaks of the monster devouring |kaggen's things and the Porcupine's things, without waiting for the food that |kaggen will give him.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The monster ||khwai
hemm s speech to the Mantis and the Mantis's reply
